body: This is why democratic countries is haram
But meh, what did i expect? This is an H book after all.

This is gonna be long af. 

This is the setting that was processed in my brain. One, Maho and Mika are lover (i think?). Two, Maho remembered the drowned tank tragedy, because the rain, i suppose?. Three, it seems like Miho died in that tragedy if we look at page 12 (14 in the reader), but if we look at page 11(or 13) Miho was sitting in the front of Maho (i guessed it from her hairstyle), in a friggin' good health (well, she was crying, though). Four, Mika ask Maho have some sex, Maho refused because she's not in the mood because remembered the tragedy or maybe Miho, but they still having sex in the end with half-hearted Maho and made Mika annoyed (maybe). 

The whole story in here is just Maho remembered Miho and the tragedy. And the sex scene is just like an extra, that has nothing to do with the story, if this shit had another chapter, be it prequel or sequel, this shit is clear. Yeah, the story here is started out of nowhere, and yeah it's a cliffhanger.
